content: neato by annie baker jumpercablesknitting com this small asymmetrical drop stitch scarf is knit in diagonally using stockinette and garter stitches you will need a minimum of 238 meters / 260 yards dk weight yarn one stitch marker 4 00mm and 3 50mm needles this design can also be knit with sock or lace weight yarns continue knitting until you reach desired size enjoy materials 238 meters / 260 yards or more meters dk yarn 4 00mm needles / us 6 3 50mm needles / us 4 1 stitch marker size approximate 54 x 15 inches after blocking gauge not crucial 20 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch abbreviations k = knit p = purl kfb = knit into front and back of next stitch to make one stitch yo = yarn over needle to make one stitch notes scarf will curl and twist as it is being knit up blocking will open up ladders and smooth out curled edges ©copyright 2014 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern instructions set up with 4 00mm / us 6 needles cast on 3 stitches k to last stitch kfb kfb k to end k to last stitch kfb kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 k to last stitch kfb kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 k to last stitch kfb kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 k6 drop next stitch yo k to last stitch kfb kfb p to the yo created from previous row knit the yo and knit 6 remaining stitches cast off loosely 4 stitches knitwise k to last stitch kfb kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 you now have eleven stitches begin pattern repeats as follows row 1 k to last stitch place stitch marker kfb row 2 kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 row 3 k to last stitch kfb row 4 kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 row 5 k to last stitch kfb row 6 kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 row 7 k to last stitch kfb row 8 kfb p to last 2 stitches k2 you now have 9 stitches after stitch marker row 9 k6 drop next stitch yo k to last stitch kfb row 10 kfb p to the yo created from previous row knit the yo and knit 6 remaining stitches row 11 cast off loosely 4 stitches knitwise k to last stitch kfb row 12 kfb p to last 2 stitches and remove stitch marker k2 repeat row 1 to 12 another 12 times you now have 14 completed cast off points repeat row 1 to 8 once more proceed to row 13 row 13 k6 drop next stitch yo k3 drop next stitch yo 14 times *see note at bottom of
